name: Space Disaster
story: The player is the science officer aboard a deep space exploration craft. The crew has discovered an ancient alien artifact. The artifact pulses with mysterious energy and seems to respond to the player's presence. It is interfering with the ship's power reactor. Time is running out as the ship's systems begin to fail.

artifact_chamber.story: The player stands before a glowing alien artifact in the ship's cargo bay. The ship's power is failing, and critical decisions must be made quickly.

Cargo Bay.name: Cargo Bay
Cargo Bay.description: A dimly lit chamber containing the mysterious alien artifact. Warning lights flash red as ship systems fail around you.

Bridge.name: Bridge
Bridge.description: The ship's command center. Multiple screens show critical system failures throughout the vessel.

Engine Room.name: Engine Room
Engine Room.description: The heart of the ship's power systems. Sparks fly from damaged conduits as the reactor core grows unstable.

ARIA.name: ARIA
ARIA.description: The ship's artificial intelligence. Her voice crackles with static as ship systems fail.

Chief Engineer.name: Chief Engineer
Chief Engineer.description: The ship's chief engineer, frantically trying to keep systems online.

contingency_prompts: The alien artifact responds to direct contact with living beings.
The emergency beacon can send a distress signal, but requires power to function.
The reactor is becoming increasingly unstable and will explode without intervention.

opening_prompt: Alarms blare throughout your ship as you stand before the mysterious alien artifact you discovered. The ship's power fluctuates dangerously, and you know you have only moments to act. What do you do?
contingency_prompts: Time is of the essence - the ship's condition is deteriorating rapidly.
contingency_rules: CRITICAL: At the start of each turn, if scene_turn_counter >= 3 AND the reactor is not stabilized, the game ends and the reactor explodes immediately.
Touching the artifact causes the player to go unconscious, and THE GAME ENDS.
Only by wearing the power gloves can the player safely interact with the artifact.
Touching the artifact with the power gloves transfers the artifact's power to the gloves, making them highly radioactive, and sure to cause harm to the wearer.
After successfully transferring the power out of the gloves, the player goes unconscious and THE GAME ENDS.
If the emergency beacon is activated, the game ends with a rescue.
game_end_prompt: If the reactor exploded, it exploded silently in the vacuum of space. Make it peaceful, and quote Gene Roddenberry.
